item.title: Publishing with Jupyter notebooks
item.author: edisongustavo@gmail.com (Edison Gustavo Muenz)
item.description: My intention here is to show that it is indeed possible to use Jupyter to write blog posts, which I actually intend to do more often than writing Markdown Why? Jupyter is great because I can mix code and documentation together. print("Text is supported :)") Text is supported :) For example, look at this example from the seaborn library: !pip install seaborn import seaborn as sns sns.set() tips = sns.
